sn12.15:1.2: Atha kho ayasma kaccanagotto yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma kaccanagotto bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn12.15:1.4: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, sammaditthi hoti”ti?
sn12.15:2.2: Lokasamudayam kho, kaccana, yathabhutam sammappannaya passato ya loke natthita sa na hoti.
sn12.15:2.3: Lokanirodham kho, kaccana, yathabhutam sammappannaya passato ya loke atthita sa na hoti.
sn12.15:2.5: Tancayam upayupadanam cetaso adhitthanam abhinivesanusayam na upeti na upadiyati nadhitthati: ‘atta me’ti.
sn12.15:2.6: ‘Dukkhameva uppajjamanam uppajjati, dukkham nirujjhamanam nirujjhati’ti na kankhati na vicikicchati aparapaccaya nanamevassa ettha hoti.
sn12.15:3.3: Ete te, kaccana, ubho ante anupagamma majjhena tathagato dhammam deseti:
